msg.msgText:
A "SNMPCommunity" object can be created by using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command. You can define access to the SNMP data on your appliance by creating one or more SNMP v2C communities. An SNMP community is required when monitoring is enabled. All communities will have read-only access.
SYNTAX: imaserver create SNMPCommunity help imaserver create SNMPCommunity "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create SNMPCommunity "Name=AdminSubnet" "HostRestriction=9.3.45.100/24"
Configuration items for the "SNMPCommunity" object: Name The name of the SNMPCommunity HostRestriction The host name or IP address of the remote SNMP manager.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
